### generateCompactUnwindEncoding() {#a0734a023f800982945eec5cff4e9fb22}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t ARMAsmBackendDarwin::generateCompactUnwindEncoding (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarfframeinfo">MCDwarfFrameInfo</a> &#42; FI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &#42; Ctxt) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Generate compact unwind encoding for the function based on the CFI instructions.

If the CFI instructions describe a frame that cannot be encoded in compact unwind, the method returns UNWIND&#95;ARM&#95;MODE&#95;DWARF which tells the runtime to fallback and unwind using dwarf.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/lib/target/arm/mctargetdesc/armasmbackenddarwin-h/#l00037">37</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/lib/target/arm/mctargetdesc/armasmbackenddarwin-h">ARMAsmBackendDarwin.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/lib/target/arm/mctargetdesc/armasmbackend-cpp/#l01195">1195</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/lib/target/arm/mctargetdesc/armasmbackend-cpp">ARMAsmBackend.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
